cause.description:
All donations will go to aiding the enstallment of basic human rights to every person on the globe whether they be from a third world country or a refugee of war.
please visit http://www.unhchr.ch/udhr/ to view the universal declaration of human rights
1. refugees and migrants
2. poverty and human rights
3. protecting human rights defenders
cause.mission: to ensure that the basic human rights are met for those in third world countries, are victims of political crimes or those seeking asylum in a foreign country.
cause.name: human rights international
